titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms1989-041
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains single letter from N. S. Andrews to his father, while Andrews was station in Washington, DC, during the Civil War.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from N. S. Andrews Letter must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: N. S. Andrews Letter, Ms1989-041, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The N. S. Andrews Letter was acquired by Special Collections prior to 1989.

altformavail.head: Alternate Form Available
altformavail.p: The letter has been scanned and is available online through the Special Collections website. See the "Contents List" below for links to the images (gifs).

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the N. S. Andrews Letter was completed in 1989. Additional description was completed in 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains single letter from N. S. Andrews to his father, while Andrews was station in Washington, D.C., during the Civil War. The letter describes Andrews' recent experiences in Virginia and his impressions of Washington, D.C.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
